release.action: Decoupled test setup from maven's build phase and re-integrated epcis-interop-test into Fosstrak epcis project module hierarchy. Tests can be started manually by running the AllTests JUnit test suite, but require a running epcis repository.
Use DBUnit to setup the required database state before each test.
Renamed packages from org.accada to org.fosstrak.
Changed build environment: Included epcis-interop-test module to a profile in order to execute it only on demand (add "-Dinterop-test" to your mvn build command to run the tests).
Changed build environment: Servlet container is automatically started and test data is automatically inserted into the database prior to running the interop tests.
